pr_title: [MINOR] remove some unused fields and correct comment typo

timeline.bodyText: We might not want to delete this because it simulates the Time and saves time spending on unit test on some cases. It depends on if it has any effect on this specific test. Make sure you understand it before you delete it. Or this can be a separate PR in the future if it's still the case.
timeline.author: Ethanlm

replies.bodyText: Thanks for catching. I will revert this and investigate further.
replies.author: RuiLi8080
